summary: A city cop is sent out to the country to go undercover and bust up a ring of moonshiners run by a woman and her three hot teenage daughters.
cast: Sherry Robinson|Don Jones|Tonia Bryan|Charles Elledge|Jeff MacKay|Larry Lambeth|Ned Austin|Valerie Putney|Mike Muscat|Heather Hall|Ronald J. Boyer|Lee McClaine|Robert Schrader|Frank Jones|Louise Burkhead|Jaqueline Pyle|Cherie Elledge|Grace Elledge|William Olsen|Phil Smoot
title: Hot Summer in Barefoot County
